resources.string:
This is an application through which user can add the goals the user want to complete and start timer according to the study sessions it has some of the following steps:-"
" "
" first page:- "
"
The first or profile page will open after the clicking on to the application you can login with authenticated username and password. If you are not authenticated then filled the two edit text which says "Enter New or Existing User name" and "Password" the data will be saved in the sqlite database."
"
1) Enter New or Existing User name is a hint for the first edittext.In this there is three validation"
" *The required field can not be empty*"
" *user can not enter the characters more than 15*"
" *can not enter any number*"
" if the user enter any characters more than 15 the data will not saved and as a result the data will not get register or inserted in the database."
"
2) Enter password is the hint for the second edit text in the login page or profile page it consist of"
" *The required field can not be empty*"
" *password is too weak try adding any alphabetical letter,number,no spaces and atleast 4 characters*"
"
if both the fields are entered according to the validation then the values are saved in the database.After clicking to the register and login users are directed to second page"
"
"
" Second page:-"
"
1)After the authorized authentication we are in the main page,where the month,date and year is display at the top"
"
2)There is a button displaying "quick measuring" as text in capital.If we click on the button a stopwatch timer is displayed and we can start, stop or reset accordingly.It is used by the user if he/she wants to study for long hours with no time limit and to check how much do they study."
"
3)There is a edit text at center that display a hint "add items to your to-do list" we can add any subject and how much do we want to study for eg.android for 1 hour.The items get added in the list view by "save" button we can refresh it with "refresh" button, delete any particular record by writing the name of the item and deleting all with "delete all" button. the list of the added items will be displayed in the listview at center."
"
4)Once the items are added then user can click on "goals" button we goes to a new activity in which there is edit text that takes the number in minutes only. we can set the number and start the timer the countdown timer will began.by click in on the reset button the timer get reset to its original time set by the user. user can also add notification if user wants to user can click on "open time picker" a time picker dialog box will appear the display the time in hours and minutes also according to the user time in smart phone the time is display in either AM or PM if user wants to get notified after sometime according to time once done a notification will appear at that particular time telling to study user can also cancel the notification"
"
5)on clicking the button on the text displaying "white music" we goes to a new activity displaying 3 white noise"
" First is "Rain""
" Second is "Busy Cafe""
" Third is "Campfire""
" The white noise help in concentrating to studying."
"
6)After clicking to the "Edit profile" button we are guided to new activity where there is two edit text in which validation is same as the first page.It have 3 buttons where the first button "about application" is this documentation itself.On clicking to the second button displaying text "change password" user can change the password after adding the username which is authenticated and login successfully and password that user want to change.in the third button displaying "delete account" user can delete the account by adding user name and password.
Enter start date and end date
Touch your goals on the home screen"\n"and measure time and improve your focus level!
Enter New or Existing User name
Day of the week selected can not be edited
There is no goals in progress "\n" How about making plans?
Current date and time by coding
Current date and time by coding
